data.title: Shiva Lingams of Kashi
data.meta_description: Shiva Lingams of Kashi - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides biographical information about the author Lalitha V. and introduces her book "Shiv Lings of Kashi" which describes and summarizes various Shiv Ling temples located in Varanasi, India based on ancient Hindu scriptures. It dedicates the book to family members and acknowledges their contributions to researching and spreading knowledge about Kashi's temples. An index at the end outlines the chapters and Shiv Ling temples that will be described.
